code: import Advisor from"./advisor.js";import General from"./general.js";import Cannon from"./cannon.js";import Elephant from"./elephant.js";import Chariot from"./chariot.js";import Horse from"./horse.js";import Solider from"./soldier.js";var instantiatePiece=function instantiatePiece(width,row,col,name,choosenSide){var pieceName=name.split("-")[0];switch(pieceName){case"advisor":return new Advisor(width,row,col,name,choosenSide);case"general":return new General(width,row,col,name,choosenSide);case"cannon":return new Cannon(width,row,col,name,choosenSide);case"soldier":return new Solider(width,row,col,name,choosenSide);case"chariot":return new Chariot(width,row,col,name,choosenSide);case"horse":return new Horse(width,row,col,name,choosenSide);default:return new Elephant(width,row,col,name,choosenSide);}};export default instantiatePiece;
